interpretation: The "slightly frowning face" emoji represents a mild disappointment or dissatisfaction. This card reminds you that not everything in life will go as planned, but it's important to stay positive and keep moving forward. Don't let setbacks get you down, as they are just temporary obstacles that can be overcome with persistence and determination. Trust in your ability to adapt and find alternative solutions when things don't go as expected. This card also serves as a reminder to be kind to yourself and not to be too hard on yourself when things don't turn out perfectly. Keywords associated with this card include disappointment, frustration, resilience, adaptability, and self-compassion.
